$Log: zfs_db_schema.xml,v $ Revision 1.1 2011/09/23 22:17:28 anoop Renamed thumper-conf roll as ZFS storage roll and included in the mainline rocks tree
Revision 1.5 2009/08/19 02:28:39 anoop Major changes to the replication database infrastructure - Allow connection to replication server as user specified username - Allow for user specified crontab strings. This is now possible as the cron script is user specific and not attached to root. This means that the script can be generated every single time from scratch - Allow for storage of public keys of replication clients, so as to automatically create authorized_keys files for the respective users
Revision 1.4 2009/05/20 05:58:45 anoop Fixed database schema
